import React, { useState } from "react"; import styles from '../assets/style.css' function BookingForm() { const [name, setName] = React.useState(''); const [location, setLocation] = React.useState(''); const [purpose, setPurpose] = React.useState(''); const [days, setDays] = React.useState(''); const [first_day, setFirstDays] = React.useState(''); const [room, setRoom] = React.useState(''); const [vaccinated, setVaccinated] = React.useState(''); const [wishes, setWishes] = React.useState(''); function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault() } function handleChange(event) { console.log(event); } return(
setName(this.target.value)} placeholder="Name and Surname" />
Yes
No
) } export default BookingForm
